channel.title: A little Graphical User Interface for you. (gameframe/sprite pack)
channel.description:
I made it to work with the Amazon Client, but if you're savvy with photoshop or gimp at all then you can simply screenshot this, and crop out the pieces you need.
Here's the files in .zip from. All this contains is the sprite folder.
NOTE: It's not perfect and has my old name on it. Sorry.. I don't have the .PSD files so I can't remove it perfectly. http://www.mediafire.com/?gyqvit3gjdk
The screenie is just some random server, not for promotion, heck the server name on there doesn't exist anymore. [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f86/maticus_06/PluhScape0020.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f86/maticus_06/PluhScape0021.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f86/maticus_06/PluhScape0022.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f86/maticus_06/PluhScape0023.png[/img]
I'm making a new one so I figured, may as well give this one away to any of you who wants it.
UPDATED and to those who say "grats, you can use paint" lets see you make one. =D

item.title: A little Graphical User Interface for you. (gameframe/sprite pack)
item.dc:creator: @Toilet_Paper Toilet Paper
item.description:
@Toilet_Paper wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:12, topic:289787"][quote author=Maticus link=topic=383069.msg2877715#msg2877715 date=1248141665]
Anyone else like it?
[/quote]
no. i don’t see how you can stand playing such an ugly client.[/quote]

I don’t understand how you can go putting others down about there work when there doing no harm to you at all.

I think the interface looks great and this is definitely not something that can be done in paint.

Great job.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Maticus Maticus
item.description:
@Maticus wrote:

I just hopped on my laptop so your smug little comments appeared to make you guys look like jerks. That is all.

I mean if you don’t like it, then hitting that x in the top right is a lot easier than hitting “reply” and typing some little smart alecy comment.
